name: TherapyRelationshipType
title: TherapyRelationshipType
description: Classification of relationship between a therapy and a contraindication or an indication.

concept.display: Only contraindicated if the other therapy is given
concept.definition: Only contraindicated if the other therapy is given

concept.display: Contraindicated unless the other therapy is given
concept.definition: Contraindicated unless the other therapy is given

concept.display: Indicated only when the other therapy is given (co-occurrent)
concept.definition: Indicated only when the other therapy is given (co-occurrent)

concept.display: Indicated except when the other therapy is given
concept.definition: Indicated except when the other therapy is given

concept.display: Indicated only if the other therapy is planned to be given afterwards (prep)
concept.definition: Indicated only if the other therapy is planned to be given afterwards (prep)

concept.display: Indicated only if the other therapy was given before (follow-up)
concept.definition: Indicated only if the other therapy was given before (follow-up)

concept.display: Indicated to replace the other therapy
concept.definition: Indicated to replace the other therapy

concept.display: Indicated to replace the other contraindicated therapy
concept.definition: Indicated to replace the other contraindicated therapy.

concept.display: Indicated to replace the other therapy not well tolerated by patient
concept.definition: Indicated to replace the other therapy not well tolerated by patient

concept.display: Indicated to replace the other therapy not effective on patient
concept.definition: Indicated to replace the other therapy not effective on patient
